annotation.spannedText: “People that work for me, just the other day, two years old, beautiful child went to have the vaccine and came back and a week later, got a tremendous fever, got very, very sick, now is autistic.”

annotation.spannedText: “It happened to somebody that worked for me recently. I mean, they had this beautiful child, not a problem in the world, and all of the sudden they go in and they get this monster shot ... they pump this in to this little body and then all of the sudden the child is different a month later.”

annotation.spannedText: “What Trump said is not just wrong, it’s dangerous because if people take him seriously and delay vaccines for their children the children could get sick,” ... “A lot of what Trump says is annoying but this is serious.
